name: Final Draft
overview: Final Draft, Inc. engages in the development and sale of scriptwriting software programs for film, television, and theatre professionals. It offers Final Draft software, a scriptwriting program that is used to write movie scripts, television episodics, and stageplays, as well as automatically paginate and format scripts to industry standards. The company also provides Final Draft AV software for professional writers of commercials, corporate and training videos, documentaries, and presentations that keep audio and video columns automatically aligned when text is added, edited, or deleted. In addition, it offers Final Draft international spell-checkers and thesauri, as well as publishes Script magazine, which includes articles, interviews, features, and in-depth coverage of the scriptwriting industry. Further, the company provides script registry, Webinar series, and coverage services. It serves studios/production centers, educational institutions, government, and non-profit organizations. The company provides its products in Canada, South America, Europe, China, and the Southeast Asia. It offers its products through retail stores, as well as online. Final Draft, Inc. was formerly known as B.C. Software, Inc. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Calabasas, California with an additional office in Baltimore, Maryland.
